name: convert_excel_to_csv
description: Convert between Excel (.xlsx/.xls) and CSV (.csv) formats.

input_path.description: Path to the input file (.xlsx, .xls, or .csv).

output_path.description: Path to the output file (.csv, .xlsx, or .xls).

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index for Excel-to-CSV conversion (ignored for CSV-to-Excel).
